Articles.Content:
True-ish, I occasionally read a book

the user below me has nightmares about robot-ninja-chickens

How did you know. AM I BEING SPIED? GET OUT OF MY MIND! gsdkfhjgklsdjhfgksdghfgh

The user below me is a giant potato.

How did you know!

the user below misses someone really bad

Yes. And its not you.

User below me is a walking paradox.

this statement is false wait a second... 0_o

the user below me has a copy of ksp 0.23.5

True.

The person below me has never played KSP with FAR.

False, but I only launched one rocket successfully.

The user below me prefers berthing spacecraft over docking spacecraft.

False, but I still regularly launch 300+ ton interplanetary drives.

The user below me has never watched a Scott Manely video.

False. I love Scott Manley.

The user below me has never gotten a spaceplane into orbit before.

True (i wont stop trying though)

The user below me has never landed on tylo before

False. I landed, once, to test a lander+ascent craft. (it went well ;-))

The user below me will not give me 100 dollars.

True, unless you give me something in return.

The user below me prefers the look of Russian rockets.
yes, i always preferred the russians rockets especially the new angara that they are testing

Nothing? fine with me.

The liar below me is a user.

I never lie.

The user below me has been in mud at least once.

Once, yes.

The user below me has watched Ika Musume.

Ee-nope.

The user below me has watched what the Modkip named Rainbowtrout said.

Ika what? I'm not cultured enough to even know what that is.

The player below me has played a pokemon game. I know I have!

True i recently played pokemon X

the person below me does not know megaman battle network 4 blue moon is worse than superman 64,sonic 06,big rigs over the road racing

Megawhat?

The next user is a user.

True.

The person below me doesn't think the world is flat

False. Look at it, it's flat! O_O

The user below me will not write a funny joke.

I don't know?

A kerbal walks into a booster. That's all folks. (Any Road Runner and Looney Toons fans will get it)

The user below me is a fan of Space Engineers.

Don't have a good enough PC to run it, so I can have no true opinion.

The user below me has a PC that can run Space Engineers.

True. I build crushers in space engineers and force ships, asteroids and people into them. Yay!

The user below me is... In socks right now?

(Oh god I am running out of forum game creativity)
